-- | An embedded DSL for the HQ9+ programming language
--   
--   An embedded DSL for the HQ9+ programming language
@package acme-hq9plus
@version 0.1


-- | An embedded DSL for the HQ9+ programming language. For more
--   information, see <a>http://esolangs.org/wiki/HQ9</a>.
module Acme.HQ9Plus
data HQ a

-- | Run an <a>HQ</a> computation.
runHQ :: HQ a -> IO a

-- | Print <tt>"Hello, world!"</tt>
h :: HQ ()

-- | Print the program's source code.
q :: HQ ()

-- | Print the lyrics to "99 Bottles of Beer". May also be written as
--   <tt>9</tt>.
nine :: HQ ()

-- | Increment the accumulator.
plus :: HQ ()

-- | An infix alias for <a>plus</a>.
(+) :: HQ ()
instance Monad HQM
instance Num (HQ a)
instance Monad HQ
instance Applicative HQ
instance Functor HQ
